original_text:
When they go with their flocks and herds
    to seek the Lord,
they will not find him;
    he has withdrawn himself from them.
korean_text: 그들이 양 떼와 소 떼를 끌고 여호와를 찾으러 갈지라도 만나지 못할 것은 이미 그들에게서 떠나셨음이라

sentences.original_text: When they go with their flocks and herds
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들의 양 떼와 소 떼를 데리고 갈 때에

sentences.original_text: he has withdrawn himself from them
